Lde/ecspride/FieldSensitivity2;->onCreat: User personal data (SIM serial number) is originated via getSystemService and getSimSerialNumber, stored in the Datacontainer's secret field. The sendTextMessage method (network transmission) is identified as a sink, but the data sent (hardcoded strings) does not include user data. No sensitive data reaches a sink or is passed to next methods.
Lde/ecspride/Datacontainer;->getDescript: No sensitive data operations were observed in this method related to its own originations. The method simply retrieves and returns a description string without originating, storing, or propagating user personal data. No sinks or method invocations were detected.
Lde/ecspride/Datacontainer;->setSecret:(: The method sets the 'secret' field of the Datacontainer instance with the provided String parameter. Based on the Previous Summary, this String is user personal data (SIM serial number) originating from getSystemService and getSimSerialNumber. The data is stored in the 'secret' field but not passed to any next methods or sinks within this method.
Lde/ecspride/Datacontainer;->setDescript: No sensitive data operations were observed in this method related to its own originations. The method sets the 'description' field of the Datacontainer instance but does not originate, propagate, or pass sensitive data to next methods or sinks.
Lde/ecspride/Datacontainer;-><init>:()V: No sensitive data operations were observed in this method related to its own originations. The method only calls the superclass constructor and does not process or propagate any user personal data.
